page.title: 16 INDUSTRY.
page.content: Children from Chesham Bois visited the Job Centre to find out about the jobs on offer to the school.No informtion was available about unemployment in the area.May and June seemed to be the months when employers wanted people for work.Some jobs were available in Chesham Bois but thre were more in Amersham and Chesham. About 65 people were wanted each month. Jobs were generally available at, Quarry, Chiltern Felt Roofing, Planet Ceilings, Pubs, Water cress beds, Swimming Pool, Lea and District Coaches, Fish Shops, Post Offices, Shackman's, Silverson's, Industrial Mixing Bowls, Engineering Print Shops, Coles Mechanical Services.
